trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 識別在方格中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridCell can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: DataGridCell 可以用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性來取得或設定任何儲存格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a DataGridCell causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the DataGridCell.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>DataGridCell 屬性會導致將焦點移至 DataGridCell 所指定資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
The number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
Gets or sets the number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的資料行數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ColumnNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ColumnNumber 值來指定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> is identical to a second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>等同於第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>第二個物件是否與第一個;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可加入至雜湊值<xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可唯一識別號碼<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>中<xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的資料列數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the RowNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 RowNumber 值來指定<xref:System.Data.DataRow>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列數目和儲存格的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的資料列數目和資料行編號。
